card.title: Welcome
card.text: Welcome to my Alexa Skill. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

voice.intro: Welcome to my Alexa Skill. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

card.title: Bodylook
card.text: It’s Trilby. He’s definitely dead. He’s wearing a silk dressing down over pajamas and slippers.

voice.intro: It’s Trilby. He’s definitely dead. He’s wearing a silk dressing down over pajamas and slippers.

card.title: Bodyget
card.text: Trilby was a big guy. He won’t fit in your inventory.

voice.intro: Trilby was a big guy. He won’t fit in your inventory.

card.title: Bodyanalyze
card.text: Trilby was a big man - over six feet tall. His comb-over is disheveled -- you knew he was secretly bald under that. He’s also been stabbed. There is a dagger high in his back. From the way the body facing, he may have been trying to get to the door. Next to his right hand is a crumpled piece of paper.

voice.intro: Trilby was a big man - over six feet tall. His comb-over is disheveled -- you knew he was secretly bald under that. He’s also been stabbed. There is a dagger high in his back. From the way the body facing, he may have been trying to get to the door. Next to his right hand is a crumpled piece of paper.

card.title: Bodysearch
card.text: You should not touch the body before the police get here

voice.intro: You shouldn’t touch the body before the police get here
